page_blocks.web_template_values: {"title":"Responsible Campus Awards","subtitle":"India's first-ever awards to recognize socially responsible colleges. One-of-its-kind attempt to learn from and strengthen Indian college's focus on building the future change-makers of this country."}

{"title":"Why are we hosting these awards?","columns":"3","features":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","title":"Promoting","content":"Promoting the spirit of doing good and volunteerism among Indian colleges.","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/promoting.png"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","title":"Learning","content":"Learning from the most socially conscious colleges and amplifying practices in other colleges.","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/learning.png"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","title":"Empowering","content":"Accelerate the effort to empower youth in India to play a stronger role in building our nation.","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/empowering.png"}]}

{"title":"Process","subtitle":"How do we do this?","columns":"2","process_steps":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","title":"1. Nominations","description":"The awards team invites applications. Colleges can self-nominate themselves. The public or students can also nominate/vote for specific colleges.","image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/nomination.png"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","title":"2. Applications","description":"Nominated colleges are reached out to and asked to submit details in a detailed form about their effort and initiatives to be socially conscious.","image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/applications.png"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","title":"3. Selection","description":"A 3-5 membered-jury would be evaluating the nominations based on fixed criteria and details submitted by the college. Final awardees are selected based on the college’s score in specific criteria and the number of public votes.","image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/selection.png"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","title":"4. Award Ceremony","description":"All the nominated colleges and the awardees are invited for the final virtual award ceremony where awards are given and guest speeches are delivered on making Indian colleges more socially responsible.","image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/awards.png"}]}

{"title":"Criteria","subtitle":"The following are the criteria with which the jury members will be evaluating the nominations from colleges. Specifics about each criteria bucket and details would be decided by the expert panel consisting of subject matter experts & NGOs.","columns":"3","features":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","title":"Social Responsibility","content":"Student groups around social responsibility", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/social-responsibility.png"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","title":"Volunteerism","content":"Volunteerism in College", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/volunteerism.png"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","title":"Leadership","content":"Students as social change leaders", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/leadership.png"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","title":"Energy Consumption & Sources", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/energy-consumption.png"},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","title":"Greenery in Campus", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/greenery.png"},{"idx":6,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 6","title":"Effective usage of Water", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/water-consumption.png"},{"idx":7,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 7","title":"Waste Management","content":"Segregation and disposal (non-food)", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/waste-management.png"},{"idx":8,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 8","title":"Food Waste Management","content":"Tracking and reduction", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/food-waste-management.png"},{"idx":9,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 9","title":"Staff Social Responsibility","content":"Number of staff working on social responsibility (partially or completely)", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/staff-social-responsibility.png"},{"idx":10,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 10","title":"Alcohol and Substance Free Campus", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/alcohol-free.png"},{"idx":11,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 11","title":"Diversity & Inclusion", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/inclusion.png"},{"idx":12,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 12","title":"Policies around Social Responsibility", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/policy.png"},{"idx":13,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 13","title":"Policies around Environment", "icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/environment-policy.png"}]}
